<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deep Gnome Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=93)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Deep gnome scouts patrol the tunnels that lead into their settlements. Some scout alone to make the most of their stealth, but others form groups for the sake of safety.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/DeepGnome_DeepGnomeScout.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Deep Gnome Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=93)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 74</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision

**Languages**
[Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Light Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (20 bullets)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 18

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
light pick +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +9 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 14
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)

**Hidden Movement**   If the deep gnome scout starts its turn undetected or hidden to a creature, that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the deep gnome scout’s attacks until the end of the turn.

</column>
